SPI_Stats_t Struct Reference
SPI Driver External Data Structures

A SPI_Stats data structure is used with SPI_getStats() to get driver statistics. More...

#include <drivers/spi/SPI.h>

Data Fields

Detailed Description

A SPI_Stats data structure is used with SPI_getStats() to get driver statistics.

Field Documentation

uint32_t SPI_Stats_t::bitErr

Number of data mismatch transmit data error - master only

uint32_t SPI_Stats_t::desync

Number of De-synchronization of slave device - master only

uint32_t SPI_Stats_t::dlenErr

Number of data length error

uint32_t SPI_Stats_t::parErr

Number of Parity error

uint32_t SPI_Stats_t::rxOvrnErr

Number of RX Overrun Error

uint32_t SPI_Stats_t::timeout

Number of timeout
